title: Backlog exam
content: What happens if you fail the backlog exam or don’t show up to write it

comments.body: You keep writing it till you pass

Any idea wen the results will be out?
Before clg reopens?

Then don't reply
Nobody is forcing you
they replied to MY comment, hence i replied back. wtf are you so worked up about?
Bro so what if you don't know just leave it, you wasting space
If I don’t show up then do they call you or is there any complication regarding that after the exam?
You'll keep being notified about the existing backlog.
Rewrite the backlog. If you don't show up, it'll be treated as fail and still have to rewrite it.
